data.title: Pizza to go...
data.text: The location is great within the strip mall and on one of the main streets in Clifton. It's your local pizza place. The staff, for the most part are friendly. The restaurant itself can use new lighting to display the various photos of celebrities and motifs.

data.title: Regular NJ style pizza.  Nothing different than any other pizza place in the area.
data.text: Regular NJ style pizza.  Nothing different than any other normal pizza place in the area.  Better than Pizza Hut.

data.title: Great Taste, Great Prices
data.text: Unfortunately, I always order the same things.  But why change it up when you're guaranteed a good meal.  Awesome cheesesteak sandwiches customized to your liking for under $8.  Very friendly personnel.  Highly recommend if you want a quick, delicious, fairly priced meal.
